text:
Created attachment 32290
Graphan output

BackendListener keeps sending the last calculated reported response time percentile when the transaction is not in action. Instead the the response time should be NULL. Response time metrics for that particular transaction should not be reported to the backend client when the transaction is not being executed. 

For more details please refer to the attached image.

Build tested in is r1645532

Regards,
Chaitanya M Bhatt
creator: bhatt.chaitanya@gmail.com

text:
Created attachment 32291
Fix to issue

This patch also renames pickleMetricsManager to graphiteMetricsManager as it handles now more than Pickle protocol

Regards
@ubikloadpack
creator: support@ubikloadpack.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
